translations: n.剃刀；刮胡刀（razor 的复数）
v.用剃刀刮；分赃（razor 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: Now they are producing throwaway razors.
sentences.translation: 他们正在生产一次性剃须刀。

sentences.sentence: A double edged razor will last a lot longer than disposable razors.
sentences.translation: 双面剃须刀比可抛弃型剃刀寿命长的多。

sentences.sentence: A handful of electric razors are recharged in a similar fashion.
sentences.translation: 很多电动剃须刀也是同样的充电原理。
